text: When I tried to play something and screwed up, I'd hear some other note that would come into play. Then I started trying different things to find the beauty in it.
author: Dimebag Darrell

text: The most common error made in matters of appearance is the belief that one should disdain the superficial and let the true beauty of one's soul shine through. If there are places on your body where this is a possibility, you are not attractive - you are leaking.
author: Charles Lamb

text: The terrifying and edible beauty of Art Nouveau architecture.
author: Salvador Dali

text: O, thou art fairer than the evening air clad in the beauty of a thousand stars.
author: Christopher Marlowe

text: Through loyalty to the past, our mind refuses to realize that tomorrow's joy is possible only if today's makes way for it that each wave owes the beauty of its line only to the withdrawal of the preceding one.
author: Andre Gide
